channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC PCS neo (Administration Console) V4.0
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC PCS neo (Administration Console) V4.0

item.title: CVE-2023-38558|2024-08-02T17:46:56.344Z -- siemens -- simatic%20pcs%20neo%20%28administration%20console%29%20v4.0
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SIMATIC PCS neo (Administration Console) V4.0 (All versions), SIMATIC PCS neo (Administration Console) V4.0 Update 1 (All versions). The affected application leaks Windows admin credentials. An attacker with local access to the Administration Console could get the credentials, and impersonate the admin user, thereby gaining admin access to other Windows systems.
